entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 8. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light this afternoon. Temperature steady near minus 8. Wind chill near minus 17. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 6. POP 30%
